src:
Sederet Promo Menarik HP Realme di Mega 11.11 Indonesia
05 Nov 2019, 02:57 by Mansur
Mega Sale HP Realme di 11.11
Oketekno – Sebagai salah satu brand paling berpengaruh di Indonesia, Realme tidak ingin meninggalkan kesempatan dalam merayakan event harbolnas 11.11 yang digelar setiap tahun berikut. Dalam program tersebut nantinya akan ada sederet HP Realme yang bakal mendapatkan diskon besar-besaran.
Dan tentu saja untuk menghadirkan berbagai macam promo yang menarik ini, Realme tidak sendirian, melainkan menggandeng beberapa e-commerce ternama Indonesia. Beberapa diantara yang bakal digaet yakni seperti Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, dan juga bisa didapetin pula melalui situs jual beli online miliknya sendiri, Realme.com.

Simak Nih: 

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Realme 5 Pro, Harga Sama Tapi Spesifikasi Beda Jauh?


Pada event penjualan tersebut nantinya akan ada beberapa perangkat eksklusif lagi yang bakal ditawarkan, diantaranya yakni seperti Realme 5 (3GB/32GB) dan Realme 3 Pro (6GB/64GB) yang dijual dengan harga spesial selama 1 hari penuh.


Copyright ©Realme

“Kami sebelumnya telah berpartisipasi dalam Festival Belanja Online 11.11 tahun lalu dan produk kami telah memecahkan banyak rekor saat itu, seperti menjadi Triple Champion Smartphone di Lazada. Tahun ini, kami kembali berpartisipasi dengan menghadirkan program khusus Mega Sale 11.11. Bekerja sama dengan Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, dan realme.com, Mega Sale 11.11 akan menghadirkan pengalaman belanja online yang unik dan pada 1 hari tersebut anak-anak muda di Indonesia bisa mendapatkan smartphone impian mereka dengan harga khusus melalui Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, dan realme.com,” kata Palson Yi selaku Brand Manager Realme Indonesia dalam siaran pers yang diberikan.
Bukan cuman menawarkan harga spesial saja, melainkan ada event Lucky Draw di Realme.com, Shopee dan Lazada. Nantinya konsumen yang berkontribusi bisa mendapatkan promo menarik lainnya dari Realme, entah itu diskon tambahan untuk pembelian HP Realme ataupun aksesoris yang disediakan. Event tersebut tersedia mulai 4 – 10 November 2019 mendatang.
Tentu saja banyak penawaran menarik yang disediakan oleh Realme, dan untuk mengetahui lebih lanjut bisa kunjungi beberapa e-commerce yang sudah disebutkan tadi. Dimana kalian bisa dapetin HP Realme dengan harga yang lebih terjangkau pastinya.
baca juga: Flash Sale Perdana Realme XT Sukses Besar
text:
A series of interesting promos of HP Realme in Mega 11.11 Indonesia
05 Nov 2019, 02:57 by Mansur
Mega Sale HP Realme at 11.11
Oketekno - As one of the most influential brands in Indonesia, Realme does not want to leave the opportunity to celebrate the 11.11 harbolnas event that is held every year. In the program there will be a series of HP Realme that will get massive discounts.
And of course to present a variety of attractive promos, Realme is not alone, but cooperates with several well-known e-commerce companies in Indonesia. Some of which will be hooked, such as Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, and can also be obtained also through online trading sites of his own, Realme.com.

Listen Here:

Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Realme 5 Pro, Same Price But Specifications Are Different?


At the sales event there will be several more exclusive devices that will be offered, including those, such as Realme 5 (3GB / 32GB) and Realme 3 Pro (6GB / 64GB) which are sold at special prices for 1 full day.


Copyright © Realme

"We previously participated in the Online Shopping Festival 11.11 last year and our products have broken many records at that time, such as becoming a Triple Champion Smartphone at Lazada. This year, we are participating again by presenting a special Mega Sale 11.11 program. In collaboration with Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, and realme.com, Mega Sale 11.11 will present a unique online shopping experience and on this 1 day young children in Indonesia can get their dream smartphone at a special price through Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, and realme.com, "said Palson Yi as Realme Indonesia's Brand Manager in a press release.
Not only offering special prices, but there are Lucky Draw events at Realme.com, Shopee and Lazada. Later consumers who contribute can get other attractive promos from Realme, whether it's an additional discount for the purchase of HP Realme or the accessories provided. The event is available from 4 - 10 November 2019.
Of course many interesting offers are provided by Realme, and to find out more, you can visit some of the e-commerce mentioned earlier. Where you can get HP Realme at a more affordable price, of course.
